ChunkText: the english language institute eli provides high quality training to those who need strengthen their english skills in speaking, listening, reading, writing, andor grammar for their personal and professional goals. the programs include intensive english program iep, academic english program aep, tesol, test prep toefl, ielts, and gre, skill-focused training e.g., accent reduction, professionalbusiness writing, conversation skills, etc. and more.
ContextBefore: the fulbright u.s. student program awards grants each year to rising and graduating seniors, current graduate students, and recent alumni students who are thinking of earning a masters degree, conducting research or teaching english in more than 140 countries worldwide.
ContextAfter: the eli also assists umbc as a whole by providing cross cultural services in an ever changing world.
